alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:23AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers will develop this morning over the mountains and then gradually spread over the remainder of the area. A period of very heavy snow will develop this afternoon and into the early evening. Southwest winds from 15 to 25 mph with gusts from 35 to 45 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds will decrease Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden, Prescott, Prescott Valley and Seligman. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 8 AM Today to 5 AM Thursday: Chino Valley 4 to 6 inches Paulden 3 to 5 inches Prescott 9 to 13 inches Prescott Valley 4 to 8 inches Seligman 6 to 10 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
